full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS RIG PA'I RGYAL MO 'JAM DPAL N'A GA RAKshA'I SGRUBS THABS BYABS KHRUS DANG BCAS RDO RJE PHA LAm ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI DAD BRTZON BLO LANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYAMS PA RNAM RGYAL MKHAS MCHOG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES BRIS PA'O,, ,,SMRAS PA, NOR BA STONG 'BYAMS SGRUB THABS NI, ,SNA TSOGS SNANG MOD TSAD MA BZHIN, ,SNYING POR BSTEBS PA DKON MTHONG NAS, ,TSUL 'DIR BDAG GIS DAL BA BSTEN, ,'OG GDON KUN LA 'CHI BA'I DPAL, ,MNGON SUM SGRUBPA'I CHO GA ZHES, ,KUN TU GRAGS LDAN ZAB MA'I PHUL, ,GRUB PAR 'DOD RNAMS 'DI BZHIN GYIS, ,DGE BAS 'GRO MANG YID KYIS MTSOR, ,BYIN BRLABS DANG PA RTAG ROL SHOG , CES PA BCOM LDAN 'DAS RIG PA'I RGYAL MO 'JAM DPAL N'A GA RAKshA'I SGRUB THABS RDO RJE PHA LAm ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ZHVA SER COD PAn 'DZIN PA MI BSKYOD DGYES BZHAD RDO RJES SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
